name: Munggar Fajar Muharram
title: Web Developer
about: Web Developer asal Bandung yang berfokus pada pembuatan aplikasi berbasis web dengan pengalaman di Laravel, Node.js, dan integrasi API. Terbiasa mengembangkan project full-stack dengan desain interaktif dan sistem fungsional yang efisien.

projects.name: Penjualan App
projects.desc: A Laravel-based web application designed for managing product sales, customers, and transactions efficiently. It demonstrates CRUD operations, authentication, and database relationships using MySQL.

projects.name: WhatsApp Bot (Wabot)
projects.desc: A Node.js-based WhatsApp bot for automating message responses and improving communication efficiency. It includes command handling and integration with external APIs.

projects.name: Ujikom Project
projects.desc: A simple PHP project created for competency testing (Ujikom), focusing on CRUD features and structured database integration.

projects.name: Form Handling App
projects.desc: A lightweight PHP project demonstrating data validation, input sanitization, and form handling in a clean user interface.

projects.name: Project PKK
projects.desc: A collaborative Laravel project for community-related activities and data management. Includes user authentication, admin dashboard, and data reporting features.
